name: 安装Docker环境
description: Docker环境是一种轻量级的虚拟化技术，可以在Linux系统上快速部署各类系统

steps.name: 下载环境安装包
steps.targetFile: docker/{% if os is starting_with('ubuntu') %}debs{% else %}rpms{% endif %}.tar.gz

steps.name: 传输环境安装包
steps.package: docker/{% if os is starting_with('ubuntu') %}debs{% else %}rpms{% endif %}.tar.gz
steps.targetFile: /setup/{% if os is starting_with('ubuntu') %}debs{% else %}rpms{% endif %}.tar.gz

steps.name: 解压环境安装包
steps.condition: sh -c 'if [ -z "$(ls /setup/ | grep {% if os is starting_with('ubuntu') %}debs{% else %}rpms{% endif %}.tar.gz)" ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi'
steps.command: tar -xzvf /setup/{% if os is starting_with('ubuntu') %}debs{% else %}rpms{% endif %}.tar.gz -C /setup

steps.name: 安装Docker
steps.command: {% if os is starting_with('ubuntu') %}dpkg -i /setup/debs/*.deb{% else %}rpm -ivh /setup/rpms/*.rpm{% endif %}
